description: The Canadian Space Agency wants to obtain complete elevator maintenance service to the David Florida Laboratory/Canadian Space Agency, located at 3701 Carling Avenue, Building No.65 in Ottawa, Ontario, in accordance to the CSA B44-94 safety codes for elevents at the requested time frequency and to the sub-section requirements.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### ***Elevator Maintenance Services***
##### ***Reference: cb-9346-78501089***

The Canadian Space Agency invites bids for the procurement of complete elevator maintenance services at the David Florida Laboratory/Canadian Space Agency, situated at 3701 Carling Avenue, Building No. 65 in Ottawa, Ontario. The contract duration will be for a base period of 12 months, with four optional extensions of one year each.

**Key Contract Details:**

| **Description** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | 9F023-20230068 | 9F023-20230068 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 12, 2023 | 12 octobre 2023 |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal | Demande de propositions |
| Tender Method | Competitive - Open Bidding | Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner |

**Requirements and Specifications:**

* The selected bidder will be responsible for providing elevator maintenance services in accordance with CSA B44-94 safety codes and Sub-section requirements.
* Security requirements are in place for this project.
* Work will be conducted at the David Florida Laboratory, 3701 Carling Avenue, CP11490, Succ. H, Ottawa, Ontario, K2H 8S2.

**Contact Information:**

Visitor Enquiries:

Jean-David Leblanc

Phone: (873) 355-9953
Email: [jean-david.leblanc@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:jean-david.leblanc@asc-csa.gc.ca)

### Tenders Documents and Attachments:

To view the tender notice and attachments, please visit the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9346/rfp---elevator-maintenance.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9346/rfp---elevator-maintenance.pdf)

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9346/ddp---entretien-des-ascenseurs.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9346/ddp---entretien-des-ascenseurs.pdf)
